name: Gravitar (itch)
description:
This is a remake of the 1982 Arcade game Gravitar. There are a few things missing from this game that were present in the original. these include: 

The second and third solar system, these were removed due to time constraints.

Repeating level when going too far left or right on the planet's surface, this was removed due to implementation reasons, and has been replaced with a bouncy wall that keep the player within bounds
